comment.author: 61932480@N00
comment._content:
Back in those days, all we had was a hammer.

In later years we'd drive "screws" into the solid air with one of those newfangled "screwdrivers".  And hoo-eeey, once those crank drills came out, we were putting holes in the air like nobody's business. But at the time, this was state-of-the-art.
